title: Intersport Logo - 'SPORT' Font used?
content:
Hello to everyone.

This is my first post and I hope someone can help me.

I am trying to identify the font used for the word 'SPORT' in the Intersport logo.

Here's the whole logo:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320223112im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Intersport-rgb_3584.png)

I have tried Identifont and What The Font and they could not identify.

Thank you.
author: gogarro

comments.content:
Helvetica Rounded – "Inter"?

Edit: Misread the post.
